str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
From idios; a private person, i.e. an ignoramus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and krino; properly, to scrutinize, i.e. investigate, interrogate, determine.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
